name: Frogs and Flies
description: Frogs and Flies is a 1982 video game by Mattel for the Atari 2600. A version was released for the same year Mattel's Intellivision system, titled Frog Bog. In both games, each player controls a frog sitting on a lily pad, attempting to eat more flies than the other. Frogs and Flies is similar to the 1978 Sega-Gremlin arcade game Frogs.
